actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to establish a national commission on private pension plans.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to establish the National Commission on Private Pension Plans. Requires the Commission to report to the President and congressional leaders on existing Federal incentives and programs that encourage and protect private retirement savings, including recommendations. Authorizes appropriations for FY 1993 and 1994.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to establish a national commission on private pension plans.
